Functions
is_numeric
function is_numeric(
p_str varchar2
)
return boolean

Checks whether p_str is numeric

Returns

TRUE, if p_str is numeric and FALSE if not

error_function_callback
function error_function_callback(
p_error in apex_error.t_error
)
return apex_error.t_error_result

Private function to include the apex error handling function, if one is defined on application or page level.

Parameter
p_error
in apex_error.t_error

Error type as defined in APEX_ERROR

Returns

Error result as defined in APEX_ERROR.

set_preference
procedure set_preference(
p_region_id varchar2,

)

Helper function for storing the preference

Parameters

varchar2

varchar2

varchar2

get_message
function get_message(
p_type varchar2,
p_attribute varchar2
)
return varchar2

Helper function for getting the title, collapse and restore messages

Parameters
p_type
varchar2

Type of the message [collapse | restore]

p_attribute
varchar2

Optional overwrites of the standard messages

Returns

Names of the messages used for collapsing and restoring controls on the page
